data.message: Uhhh...this is probably a mistake. He is going to get so much hate on here....

replies.message: Republicans are going to make themselves look stupid and liberals are going to look like cult followers. Same stuff as always

Hi Jon u know what?  It's all good freedom of speech like that old saying sticks & stones may break ur bones but names will never hurt me!  All the haters out there & on here can hate all they want 2 but Let Me See U Do His Job that goes for the hate on Mrs. Obama 2, I know there's some out there think she ain't doing nothing either. No it's not like his job but she's out there doing a lot of great work!  When some people hate they find any reason 2 hate on any1 & on that note have a bless afternoon!
Jon? I think you have the wrong post there buddy.   And...you liked your own post....
I'm responding 2 what u said 2hrs ago I was cutting down name short my bad Joanas.
Jon isn't short for Jonas. It's short for Jonathan.  Regardless...I never mentioned how I felt about him....only that he was going to get a lot of hate on here.

Yea Jonas I liked my post. What u can't like ur own post, it's some kind of golden fb rule that I like???  I believe it's ok lol & if not so what like I said earlier have a bless 1 & Happy Thanksgiving 2 u & ur fam :0).
Yeah it kinda is a golden rule. It's a bit weird to like your own posts.
Well some people have good reasons to hate ....
@Jonas well I am weird & crazy lol.
& yea I agreed w/u haters gonna hate but who cares I don't & I know Obama don't either he has a country 2 run thatz more of hez concern.
Jonas you got that right!  The slime keeps coming from under that rock!!!   Surprising a lot of them have not die of heart attacks!!!!

Raine. We wish it would . The only place he runs it is in the ground. He divides and conquers. Crammed his health care plan down our throats. Lied through his teeth to get it passed. We don't hate him, we disagree with his style of leadership,his policies and his making law by himself. He is supposed to enforce laws on the books. He does the opposite. He makes law and dies not enforce the ones all ready in place. I feel ashamed if the direction he is taking our country.
Raine Thedevilzalie Jones ....Your an idiot ,I have  plenty of reasons to HATE...Your head is so far in the Sand ,or some where else that you can't see it,or your just a Libtard-Sheeple !!!!
And this makes you look ignorant as well. If you have a fact based argument...use it. If you personally attack someone for perceived ignorance...you should do so on someone else's comment.
It's just a country full of openunated people, many don't even take the time to verify the source of their stated openions.

Not sure what Michelle has done but take expensive trips. The school lunch program isn't working. The meals are atrocious!  Kids are allowed to bring lunches from home now. And so many are doing just that! So, what else has she done?
